channel.title: All the XYZs by Al3xis
channel.description: Recent content on All the XYZs by Al3xis

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hello world This my first post A new blog site built with Hugo. Future deploy with Netlify. The testing continues Trying to finalise git and then will set-up Netlify. Deploying with Netlify Successfully changed DNS namesaervers to point to Netlify. Successfully enabled https. Netlify domain works and shows the website. BUT my domain doesn’t seem to work yet… Maybe needs more time for the nameservers to refresh on the Netlify’s part?
